dc_title_s: Plat book of Sanilac County, Michigan
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (29 leaves) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Scale determined from section lines.|Includes advertisements from local businesses.|Most pages arranged alphabetically, but some are out of order.|Date estimated by history of Port Sanilac Bank of Platts, Burgess & Co. President James McCaren's obituary states he came to the bank in 1924 and served as president until his death in 1932.|Cover missing.|Title derived by cataloger. | Scale approximately 1:51,000
